author: Alex Puncekar
description:
David C. Smith is the author or coauthor of 22 published novels, primarily in the sword-and-sorcery, horror, and suspense genres. Ten of his novels from the 1970s and 1980s are now being revised to be republished by Borgo Press/Wildside Press; the first three—which form the epic fantasy trilogy The Fall of the First World—are now available. […]

The post An Interview with David C. Smith appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: An Interview with David C. Smith
